Articles.Content: Realplume is the latest in a series of realism mods for KSP but will probably speak to casual players as well. This mod adds realistic engine exhaust plume expansion to engines, and it must be said that they look amazing. Check the [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129119-1-0-4-RealPlume-Stock-Configs-v0-4](**forum thread** for more information and the download link!
wow! I have the engine lighting mod now, I wonder if this makes it redundant.

Real ?! How dare you ?

No.

False alarm.

> 
> is real plumes

Yes, it is real plumes indeed.
It'd be nice to have this kind of effects in stock

Glad that RealPlume now has removed all the RO dependencies from CKAN so it can be installed by itself.

Needs to be stock.

> 
> wow! I have the engine lighting mod now, I wonder if this makes it redundant.

They add different effects. Engine Lighting makes the plume a light source, RealPlume makes more realistic (and beautiful!) engine plumes and smoke effects. Combine them for best effect.
